title: Admin UI: display 30% commission rate from monetization config

requirements.summary: Show the active commission rate from the backend monetization config in Admin Monetization Settings and Admin Earnings Dashboard when the Commission model is active.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Admin Monetization Settings page, when the active model is Commission, the Commission Rate input is pre-filled with the backend value (30 on a fresh deploy).
On the Admin Earnings Dashboard page, when the active model is Commission, the label shows "30% per booking" (or the current configured percent if changed later).

file_operations.description: Ensure the Commission Rate input is reliably pre-filled from the backend monetization config when model is Commission by treating 0 as a valid value (avoid truthy checks on bigint fields) and keeping the existing config-to-form hydration behavior aligned with the backend-provided commissionRate (30 on fresh deploy).

Ensure the Active Model label renders the commission rate as "<rate>% per booking" whenever the active model is Commission, including when the configured rate is 0 (avoid truthy checks on bigint fields) so it always reflects the current backend monetization config value.
